About Monarch Educational Foundation

Who Are We?

Monarch Educational Foundation is a school of upright morals and High Discipline. Pupils are at the heart of everything we do at Monarch Educational Foundation. We Provide the Pupils with Excellent academic education. Monarch is an Academically Challenging Shool. We provide Adequate Knowledge and Understanding required to stand firmly in college

Social Engagement

We Build an Interactive Learning Environment between the Teacher, Pupils and Parents. This helps both the Pupils, Teachers and the Parent.

Supportive Community

When you arrive at Monarch Educational Foundation , Your Children are welcome by a friendly and welcoming community of staff and pupils.

A Unique Primary School

Monarch Educational foundation has been recognized as one of the top 10 Private Primary School in the whole of ibadan, Abarapa Local Government for working as one community to make a difference globally.
